name: vscode-fcr-insight-companion
description: VS Code extension integrating GitHub MCP tools and PR Code Review

chatParticipants.name: work
chatParticipants.description: Unified Work Assistant for GitHub, Jira, and Confluence

commands.name: gh-review
commands.description: Review a Pull Request. Usage: <url> or [owner/]repo <number>

commands.name: gh-comment
commands.description: Add a review comment to a Pull Request

commands.name: jira
commands.description: Interact with Jira (search, create issue, etc.)

commands.name: confluence
commands.description: Interact with Confluence (search, get page, etc.)

fcr-insight.defaultOwner.description: Default GitHub Owner (organization or username) to use when not specified in the prompt.

fcr-insight.reviewPrompts.description: Custom prompts for Code Review. Key is the prompt name, value is the prompt text.

default.concise:
Review this PR concisely. Focus only on critical bugs and security issues.
Title: ${title}
Changes:
${diff}

Output ONLY a JSON array of comments:
```json
[{ "path": "...", "line": 1, "body": "..." }]
```
